title: Tarantula!
description: Get ready for some big, hairy spider action. Tarantula! explains many interesting facts about these misunderstood animals. Captions, boldface print, and detailed photos make this a great book to discuss nonfiction features of text with students. Students also have the opportunity to ask and answer questions as well as determine the author's purpose.
meta: fangs, harmless, prey, sense, spider, venom
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Commas : Recognize and use commas in a series
Boldface Words : Understand the purpose of boldface words in text

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
